page.title: 07Leisure in South Kirkby
page.content: We sent out a questionaire about the leisure activities in South Kirkby,in 1985.We discovered that most people prefered{clubs}to pubs and that the most popular local was the Rose and Crown because of its cosy and friendly atmosphere.People went there to meet their friends.The people have many {leisure activities}ranging from music, jogging,keeping fit to wine making, golf,squash and even sea angling.Many of the ladies like a frame of bingo and most play once weekly.Only one person interviewed did not have a {television}and quite a few have a video which they use very often.Most prefer to{holiday}at home and prefer a hotel,others enjoy hiking,camping and caravaning.The cinema has declined few people go regularly.Favorite T.V. programmes are the "soap operas" such as 'Dallas'.Sport is very popular.
